message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

I understand you think the product is pricey, but I've done my research and I'm confident it's worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $1050000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to think you're getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I'm not going to give it away. I can sell it to you for $1025000. This is my final offer on the lower end, so think carefully before responding.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $995000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. This is my last offer, so think carefully before responding.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $995000, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I've given you a lot of concessions, Bob. I'm not going to go any lower than $990000. This is my absolute final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $985000 for the product. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options, including buying from John for $1200000.
